title: Indian Institute of Science
summary: The Indian Institute of Science (IISc) is a public, deemed, research university for higher education and research in science, engineering, design, and management. It is located in Bengaluru, in the Indian state of Karnataka. The institute was established in 1909 with active support from Jamsetji Tata and thus is also locally known as the "Tata Institute".[5] It was granted the deemed to be university status in 1958 and the Institute of Eminence status in 2018.
